#summary Documentation of the WAYF BIRK setup

= Corto setup = 

  # Setup Apache (VHOST, SSL etc.)
  # Checkout Corto from SVN. We assume that Corto is installed in `/var/www/`
{{{
svn checkout http://corto.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ /var/www/corto
}}}
  # Create a `privatekeys`folder
{{{
mkdir /var/www/corto/privatekeys
}}}
  # Copy private key til `privatekeys` folder
  # Check that all metadata to be used by BIRK is present i JANUS (SP, Proxy-SP, IdP)
    * Remember to create a state called BIRK and move SP's to this state
  # Check that all exportes are included in JANUS
  # Run birk.mdmgmt.php
{{{
php /var/www/corto/metadata/birk.mdmgmt.php
}}} 

= Matadata = 

JANUS is used to supply metadata to BIRK
